plot: The last surviving veterans of the worst battle of a zombie war recount their horrific memories to an author who is writing a book about their experiences.
title: Ridge War Z
plot_es: The last surviving veterans of the worst battle of a zombie war recount their horrific memories to an author who is writing a book about their experiences.
plot_en: The last surviving veterans of the worst battle of a zombie war recount their horrific memories to an author who is writing a book about their experiences.
